CustomField.description: For easy access in Manage Products Flow -should only contain the values that are in the flow Tier_Plan custom pick list choice set
CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( Product2.Tier_Plans_Available__c , "Launch+" ), "Launch+; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product2.Tier_Plans_Available__c , "Base" ), "Base; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product2.Tier_Plans_Available__c , "Brand+" ), "Brand+; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product2.Tier_Plans_Available__c , "Growth+" ), "Growth+; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product2.Tier_Plans_Available__c , "Premium+" ), "Premium+; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product2.Tier_Plans_Available__c , "Enterprise" ), "Enterprise; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product2.Tier_Plans_Available__c , "Leads Pro" ), "Leads Pro; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product2.Tier_Plans_Available__c , "SEO Pro" ), "SEO Pro; ",null )
CustomField.label: Tier Plans Available
